Question: Which of the following statements are true regarding the relationships among the individuals involved in the movie?
Options:
A. Paul Haggis wrote the movie directed by Clint Eastwood.
B. Albert S. Ruddy produced the movie along with Tom Rosenberg.
C. Clint Eastwood won the Black Reel Award for Best Film.
D. Paul Haggis, Albert S. Ruddy, and Tom Rosenberg worked together as producers.
Answer: A) Paul Haggis wrote the movie directed by Clint Eastwood., B) Albert S. Ruddy produced the movie along with Tom Rosenberg., D) Paul Haggis, Albert S. Ruddy, and Tom Rosenberg worked together as producers.
